Koga Shuko/Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons


::Koga Shuko saw Megatron being dragged, away, himself being slammed into a 
wall from Zardus and Nemesis Enforcer's attacks::
"Missile launchers...Unitron, disrupt their assault."
<Hades, Anubis, attack the outside>
::three autoguns began to open fire, two on Zardus, one on Nemesis::
"Set, I suggest getting our gestalt team together, the Dieties (name hasn't 
been 100% decided), Ra, Zeus, Anubis, Hades, and Ares."

==========

::Nemesis Enforcer laughed as shots bounced of his chest, stinging badly, but 
a missile easily destroyed the autogun, Nemesis firing another missile off at 
the ship::
"Like shootin' cyber ducks in a barre-WHA-AGH!" Nemesis yelled as two hands 
grabbed him from behind, and lifted him into the air::
"UNICRON!?"

::Unitron, who can be easily mistakened for his 'namesake', threw Nemesis up 
into the air a few feet (since he'd have to be really strong to do higher), 
sending his knee up, slamming into Nemesis' stomach as he fell, the Alliance 
member smashing to the ground slowly getting up, but a kick to the chin sent 
Nemesis into a flip, landing on his back out cold::

::Unitron pulled out two laser rifles, firing two shots from one at Nemesis 
chest, the other two at the back of Zardus' left knee::

==========

::The Oblitercons spotted the ship, approaching it slowly::

=========
